alert.note: Alert for Sevier (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 24 at 2:06AM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM EDT EARLY THIS MORNING... ...REPLACES FLASH FLOOD WARNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of east Tennessee, including the following county, Sevier. * WHEN...Until 500 AM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 303 AM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain fell due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing in the advisory area. Between 1.5 and 3.5 inches of rain have fallen. - A few roads remain closed within the flood advisory. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Sevierville, Gatlinburg, Pigeon Forge, Pittman Center, Harrisburg, Elkmont, Wears Valley, Great Smoky Mountains National Park, Roundtop Mountain State Park and Fairgarden. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
